import batteryImg from '../assets/battery.jpg'; import strapImg from '../assets/strap.jpg'; import cleaningImg from '../assets/cleaning.jpg'; import repairImg from '../assets/watch_banner_1_1764666960565.png'; import waterTestImg from '../assets/watch_banner_2_1764666980783.png'; import customizeImg from '../assets/watch_banner_3_1764666995991.png'; export default function Service() { return (
{/* Decorative Background Elements */}
{/* Section Title */}

Our Premium Services

Expert care and precision craftsmanship for your treasured timepieces

{/* Services Grid */}
{/* Service Card 1 - Battery Replacement */}

Battery Replacement

Fast and affordable battery services for your watch. Keep your watch running perfectly with our fast and affordable battery replacement service. Our expert technicians use high-quality, long-lasting batteries suitable for all major watch brands. Most replacements are completed within minutes, ensuring your timepiece is back on your wrist and ticking accurately without delay.

{/* Service Card 2 - Strap Adjustment */}

Strap Adjustment & Replacement

Custom fitting for comfort and style. Achieve the perfect fit for your watch with our professional strap adjustment and custom fitting service. Whether you need links removed, a new strap installed, or a complete size adjustment, we ensure your watch feels as good as it looks.

{/* Service Card 3 - Cleaning & Maintenance */}

Cleaning & Maintenance

Professional cleaning to keep your watch shining. Restore your watch's brilliance with our professional cleaning and maintenance service. We carefully remove dirt, dust, and buildup from every part of your timepiece using specialized tools and gentle, watch-safe solutions.

{/* Service Card 4 - Watch Repair & Servicing (NEW) */}

Watch Repair & Servicing

Complete mechanical repair and restoration services. Expert repair services for all types of watches, from simple fixes to complex mechanical overhauls. Our certified technicians handle everything from movement servicing to complete restoration, ensuring your timepiece performs flawlessly for years to come.

{/* Service Card 5 - Water Resistance Testing (NEW) */}

Water Resistance Testing

Professional seal integrity and waterproofing checks. Ensure your watch's water resistance with our advanced pressure testing equipment. We verify seal integrity, test waterproofing capabilities, and replace gaskets as needed. Essential for divers and water sports enthusiasts to maintain protection against moisture damage.

{/* Service Card 6 - Watch Customization (NEW) */}

Watch Customization

Personalization and premium engraving services. Make your watch uniquely yours with our customization services. From elegant case back engraving to dial modifications and custom bezels, we offer personalization options that transform your timepiece into a one-of-a-kind treasure with meaningful personal touches.

); }
